SvgTriangleComponent

  direction="left|right|up|down"

  rotate="number of degrees"
  filter="filter id"
  class="class names"}}

className

Array private

Defined in addon/components/svg-triangle.js:37

This is an array of class names to be added to the svg element.

Default: ['ember-svg-shapes', 'svg-triangle']

direction

String

Defined in addon/components/svg-triangle.js:31

fill

String

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:64

The fill color. ` {{svg-triangle fill="blue"}} `

filter

String

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.FilterMixin: addon/mixins/filter.js:20

## Filter The id of the filter to be applied to the svg shape component. Set the id attribute of the filter component... ` {{#svg-filters}} {{filter-drop-shadow id="drop-shadow" dx="2" dy="4"}} {{/svg-filters}} ` ..then set the filter attribute of the SVG shape component to the same value. ` {{svg-triangle filter="drop-shadow"}} `

String private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.FilterMixin: addon/mixins/filter.js:44

Number

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:76

Rotate the shape.

Default: 0

size

Number

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:28

This value is used to set the height and width of the svg element. The value is pixels (px). The default is 10.

Default: 10

stroke

String

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:38

The stroke color. Use this with strokeWidth to set a border around the shape. ` {{svg-triangle stroke="blue" strokeWidth="2"}} `

Default: 'black'

strokeWidth

Number

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:51

The stroke width. Use this with stroke to set a border around the shape. ` {{svg-triangle strokeWidth="2" stroke="blue"}} `

Default: 0

style

String private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:85

This is a computed property. It sets the height and width of the svg element.

tagName

String private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:12

Default: 'svg'

transform

String private

Inherited from SvgShapes.Mixins.SvgMixin: addon/mixins/svg.js:98

This is a computed property. It sets the transform attribute of the polygon element.
